statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 10 AND product_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases USING (customer_id) WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT customer_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_purchases FROM customers JOIN purchases USING (customer_id) GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT purchase_date, product_name, name FROM purchases p INNER JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id INNER JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT * FROM purchases INNER JOIN customers ON purchases.customer_id = customers.customer_id
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 500;

SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, order_items.quantity FROM orders JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id;

SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM Purchases WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 5;
SELECT name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT Customers.name AS customer_name, Products.name AS product_name, Purchases.purchase_date FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id JOIN Products ON Purchases.product_id = Products.product_id;
